data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Shabeellaha Hoose, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shabeellaha Hoose, Somalia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 441 believers living in Shabeellaha Hoose, Somalia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Shabeellaha Hoose, Somalia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Shabeellaha Hoose to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jiiddo people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, teach the 441 believers in the state of Shabeellaha Hoose the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Shabeellaha Hoose, Somalia. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Shabeellaha Hoose to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Shabeellaha Hoose
location.people_groups_list: Mushunguli, Oromo, Garre, Bajuni, Arab, Dabarre
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mushunguli (43,000), Oromo, Garre (114,000), Bajuni (11,000), Arab (6,300), Dabarre (42,000)
